name: Friday the 13th (CWP GAMES)
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You play as Sarah, who came to Crystal Lake holiday camp with her friends for a holiday, hoping to have a great time. However, your plans are interrupted by a serial killer whose main goal is to kill everyone.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features

- Poorly written dialogues

- 40-60 minutes of gameplay

- Creepy environment

- 2 Endings

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Note: This game is not inspired by the original Friday the 13th story. Although some elements were borrowed, the story is completely different.
